suggestion: Use toast notifications or modal components
description: Alert dialogs are blocking and provide poor user experience

suggestion: Use structured logging with Winston or similar
description: Console statements should not appear in production code

suggestion: Use proper form components with validation
description: Prompt dialogs are unreliable and block the UI thread
productionAlternative: import { openInputModal } from '@/lib/modals'; const value = await openInputModal({PARAM});

suggestion: Use real API calls with proper data fetching
description: Hardcoded data prevents dynamic functionality
productionAlternative: import { apiClient } from '@/lib/api'; const {VARNAME} = await apiClient.get('{ENDPOINT}');

description: Fake delays mask real performance issues
Static responses don't reflect real application behavior

suggestion: Use Context API or state management library
description: Deep prop drilling makes components tightly coupled

suggestion: Use global state management for shared data
description: Global concerns should be managed globally

suggestion: Use CSS classes with design system
description: Inline styles hurt performance and maintainability
Accessibility is required for inclusive applications
Raw HTML lacks design system consistency

replacement: try { const response = await fetch({PARAM}); if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Request failed'); return await response.json(); } catch (error) { logger.error('Fetch failed', error); throw error; }
description: Unhandled errors crash applications
productionAlternative: import { logger } from '@/lib/logger'; try { const response = await fetch({PARAM}); if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Request failed'); return await response.json(); } catch (error) { logger.error('Fetch failed', error); throw error; }

description: Unvalidated inputs cause runtime errors
productionAlternative: import { z } from 'zod'; const {SCHEMA} = z.object({...}); function {FUNCNAME}(params: {TYPE}) { const validated = {SCHEMA}.parse(params);

description: Loading states improve user experience
productionAlternative: import { useQuery } from '@tanstack/react-query'; const { data, isLoading, error } = useQuery({QUERYKEY}, {FETCHER});

replacement: {items.length === 0 ? <EmptyState message="No items found" action={<Button>Add Item</Button>} /> : renderItems()}
description: Empty states guide users on next actions
productionAlternative: import { EmptyState, Button } from '@/components/ui'; {items.length === 0 ? <EmptyState message="No items found" action={<Button>Add Item</Button>} /> : renderItems()}

description: Error logging should be structured and searchable
Warning logging should be structured and filterable
Fake delays mask real performance characteristics

suggestion: Use comprehensive error handling with logging and recovery
replacement: try { {TRYBLOCK} } catch (error) { logger.error('Operation failed', { error: error.message, stack: error.stack, context: {CONTEXT} }); throw new AppError('Operation failed', { cause: error }); }
description: Error handling should be comprehensive and actionable
productionAlternative: import { logger } from '@/lib/logger'; import { AppError } from '@/lib/errors'; try { {TRYBLOCK} } catch (error) { logger.error('Operation failed', { error: error.message, stack: error.stack, context: {CONTEXT} }); throw new AppError('Operation failed', { cause: error }); }

suggestion: Extract to CSS modules or styled components
description: Large inline styles should be extracted for maintainability

suggestion: Add ARIA labels for screen readers
description: Interactive elements must be accessible

suggestion: Use global auth context or store
description: Authentication state should be globally managed
productionAlternative: import { useAuthStore } from '@/lib/auth-store'; const { user, setUser } = useAuthStore();

description: Loading states should be managed consistently
productionAlternative: import { useAsyncOperation } from '@/lib/async'; const { isLoading } = useAsyncOperation({OPERATION});
